content: Is this a misconfiguration made by me? I am not able to run datacapturegallery as installing it returns with Launch succeeded but no app has been installed.

anubhav said:

Is this a misconfiguration made by me? I am not able to run datacapturegallery as installing it returns with Launch succeeded but no app has been installed.

It's working for me so you can probably try invalidating cache and restarting the IDE. If it still doesn't work you can try building the debug apk and then installing it on your device.
okay thanks @Aditya Kurkure Let me try.
@Aditya Kurkure thanks it works now. Additionally, it needed a rebuild, and datacapturegallery is working now.

@anubhav heads up for a lot of R errors while working in this app. When you face these errors,you will have to consistently clean project-> rebuild project mostly and/or invalidate cache->restart project.
Worked for me, hope that works for you too. :+1: :grinning:
@Anushka Chakraborty thanks, I am following the same and it helps multiple times. :smile: :tada:
can you create an issue if this is something reproduciable? thanks a lot!
